segments.text: I see the children are definitely breaking a rule here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sneaking cookies right from the jar, without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stealthy hand reaching in is a dead giveaway.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's expectant posture shows she's in on the plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic case of forbidden sweets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember doing things like that when I was a child.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a thrill to getting away with something you shouldn't.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being very careful not to make too much noise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman, of course, is completely distracted, which helps their cause.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It almost makes me want to cheer them on, silently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being quite clever, considering the circumstances.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This little act of rebellion is rather endearing, honestly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope they don't cause too much of a ruckus if they get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Breaking rules can be fun, but sometimes there are consequences.
segments.speaker: PAR
